title: Book of Monsters - Dragons
description: Book of Monsters:Dragon Book (Ages 5 and up)There are 26 colourful cartoon Dragons featured in this easy to read and informative fact file. All illustrations are based on Dragon myths from various world mythologies. Some Dragons are well known, others are fairly obscure. By time you are finished you will be a Dragon master!Part of the Book Of Monsters series.The Book of Monsters series is suitable for reluctant readers. Each page features a large image, accompanied by a small amount of descriptive text.(less)
author: Antony Briggs
